page.title: 09Whitminster Court.
page.content:
Whitminster has had an Assize Court for many years. Nowadays the majority of cases heard here are speeding offences from the nearby M5. Some very famous people have been tried for speeding in this court, including members of the Royal Family who live in the area.
There are fifteen magistrates based at the court. Newspaper reporters are allowed in but if you are under 17 you can't go in.
There used to be a cell and a fingerprint room at the Court but these are not used any more.
The Court building is a new modern structure and is not liked by locals who feel that it is out of keeping with the rest of the village.
